name: Desert Bike
description:
Want to play Desert Bus, but lack the money, the motivation, or maybe the specs to run such an intensive and open world game? Then look no further than Desert Bike! Travel through a straight and completely barren desert, where you drive from one unnamed location to another unnamed location, whilst being able to run on even the most simplest of systems!

This game is intended as a joke, and should not be taken seriously. This game will not be updated unless a game breaking bug is found or there is major popularity.
